column1: # Transaction Type Reference Data - CSV Test Fixture
# CardDemo System: Spring Batch Testing Support
# This CSV test fixture provides comprehensive transaction type reference data
# - Transaction type classification validation with 2-character codes
# - Debit/credit indicator testing for transaction direction processing
# - PostgreSQL reference table constraint testing and validation
# - Transaction processing rule validation based on type classification
# - Spring Batch reference data processing and business logic testing
# - Standard transaction types (01-07) with correct debit/credit indicators
# - Edge cases for boundary condition testing
# - Business rule validation for transaction processing
# - debit_credit_indicator: Boolean flag for transaction direction (BOOLEAN)
